net.objectzoo.delegates.helpers
Class DynamicAsyncInvoker

java.lang.Object
  net.objectzoo.delegates.helpers.DynamicAsyncInvoker
All Implemented Interfaces:
DynamicFuncAsync
public class DynamicAsyncInvoker
extends Object
implements DynamicFuncAsync

This helper class is used to dynamically invoke the "beginInvoke" method of asynchronous actions or funcs using reflection.

Author:
tilmann

Constructor Summary
DynamicAsyncInvoker(Class<TargetType> targetType, TargetType target)
          Creates a new DynamicAsyncInvoker that invokes the the "beginInvoke" method of the target type on the given target instance.
 
Method Summary
 FuncAsyncResult<?> beginDynamicInvoke(FuncAsyncCallback<Object> callback, Object asyncState, Object... params)
          Asynchronously invoke this DynamicFuncAsync with the given parameter values, callback and asyncState.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

DynamicAsyncInvoker

public DynamicAsyncInvoker(Class<TargetType> targetType,
                           TargetType target)
Creates a new DynamicAsyncInvoker that invokes the the "beginInvoke" method of the target type on the given target instance.

Type Parameters:
TargetType - the type defining the invoke method
Parameters:
targetType - the type defining the invoke method
target - the target instance for the invocation
Method Detail

beginDynamicInvoke

public FuncAsyncResult<?> beginDynamicInvoke(FuncAsyncCallback<Object> callback,
                                             Object asyncState,
                                             Object... params)
Asynchronously invoke this DynamicFuncAsync with the given parameter values, callback and asyncState. Associated with each call to beginDynamicInvoke is an FuncAsyncCallback instance returned by the call and given to the callback that can be used to track the status and outcome of the invocation.

Specified by:
beginDynamicInvoke in interface DynamicFuncAsync
Parameters:
callback - the FuncAsyncCallback, if given to beginDynamicInvoke, is invoked upon completion of the DynamicFuncAsync's invocation and receives the same FuncAsyncResult that is returned by the call to beginDynamicInvoke.
asyncState - the asyncState is an arbitrary reference that, if given to beginDynamicInvoke, can be retrieved from this invocations FuncAsyncResult.getAsyncState()
params - the parameter values for the invocation
Returns:
the FuncAsyncResult associated with this asynchronous invocation
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter count given to this method does not match the parameter count of the beginInvoke method defined at construction time.
